data.tooltip: This program entails indicators to monitor reporting of attendance and presence of students in the jurisdiction.
This program entails indicators to monitor reporting of attendance and presence of teachers in the jurisdiction.
This program entails indicators to monitor compliance of monthly review meetings being conducted at all levels.
Unified District Information System for Education

NISHTHA is a capacity building programme for "Improving Quality of School Education through Integrated Teacher Training". It aims to build competencies among all the teachers and school principals at the elementary stage.
